49412fe63e9a184b056562c6c13dd4a0529a5d9a2e685a","dweb:/ipfs/QmVK5iCNAMcEJQxT59bsC5E53JQASDQPU6khHox3d5ZXCn"]}},"version":1}

documentation.text:
@notice Forwards a batch commit to Voting.
 @param commits struct to encapsulate an `identifier`, `time`, `hash` and optional `encryptedVote`.

@notice Forwards a batch reveal to Voting.
 @param reveals is an array of the Reveal struct which contains an identifier, time, price and salt.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address,uint256,struct VotingAncillaryInterface.PendingRequestAncillary memory[] memory) external returns (struct FixedPoint.Unsigned memory)

documentation.text:
@notice Forwards a batch commit to Voting.
 @param commits struct to encapsulate an `identifier`, `time`, `hash` and optional `encryptedVote`.

@notice Forwards a batch reveal to Voting.
 @param reveals is an array of the Reveal struct which contains an identifier, time, price and salt.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address,uint256,struct VotingAncillaryInterface.PendingRequestAncillary memory[] memory) external returns (struct FixedPoint.Unsigned memory)

devdoc.details: Allows a UMA token holder to designate another address to vote on their behalf. Each voter must deploy their own instance of this contract.

addMember(uint256,address).details: Reverts if `roleId` does not represent an initialized, SharedRole or if the caller is not a member of the managing role for `roleId`.

params.commits: struct to encapsulate an `identifier`, `time`, `hash` and optional `encryptedVote`.

params.reveals: is an array of the Reveal struct which contains an identifier, time, price and salt.

params.hash: the keccak256 hash of the price you want to vote for and a random integer salt value.
params.identifier: uniquely identifies the feed for this vote. EG BTC/USD price pair.
params.time: specifies the unix timestamp of the price being voted on.

params.finderAddress: keeps track of all contracts within the system based on their interfaceName.
params.ownerAddress: address of the owner of the DesignatedVoting contract.
params.voterAddress: address to which the owner has delegated their voting power.

getMember(uint256).details: Reverts if `roleId` does not represent an initialized, exclusive role.

returns._0: the address of the current ExclusiveRole member.

holdsRole(uint256,address).details: Reverts if roleId does not correspond to an initialized role.

returns._0: True if `memberToCheck` is a member of `roleId`.

removeMember(uint256,address).details: Reverts if `roleId` does not represent an initialized, SharedRole or if the caller is not a member of the managing role for `roleId`.

params.memberToRemove: the current SharedRole member to remove.

renounceMembership(uint256).details: Reverts if the caller is not a member of the role for `roleId` or if `roleId` is not an initialized, SharedRole.

resetMember(uint256,address).details: Reverts if the caller is not a member of the managing role for `roleId` or if `roleId` is not an initialized, ExclusiveRole.

retrieveRewards(uint256,(bytes32,uint256.details: Rewards are added to the tokens already held by this contract.

params.roundId: defines the round from which voting rewards will be retrieved from.
params.toRetrieve: an array of PendingRequests which rewards are retrieved from.

returns._0: amount of rewards that the user should receive.

params.identifier: voted on in the commit phase. EG BTC/USD price pair.
params.price: used along with the `salt` to produce the `hash` during the commit phase.
params.salt: used along with the `price` to produce the `hash` during the commit phase.
params.time: specifies the unix timestamp of the price being voted on.

devdoc.title: Proxy to allow voting from another address.

batchCommit((bytes32,uint256,bytes,bytes.notice: Forwards a batch commit to Voting.

batchReveal((bytes32,uint256,int256,byte.notice: Forwards a batch reveal to Voting.

getMember(uint256).notice: Gets the current holder of the exclusive role, `roleId`.

holdsRole(uint256,address).notice: Whether `memberToCheck` is a member of roleId.

resetMember(uint256,address).notice: Changes the exclusive role holder of `roleId` to `newMember`.

retrieveRewards(uint256,(bytes32,uint256.notice: Forwards a reward retrieval to Voting.

withdrawErc20(address,uint256).notice: Withdraws ERC20 tokens from the contract.
